授業の概要・背景: The Otsuka Museum of Art in Tokushima has recreated 1000 works of European art using their chemical process to print them on tiles that preserve the size, color, and design of the original artworks. We will look at the 25 most famous works of art and examine their location, history, artist, and concept. If students can not attend the optional field trip to the museum they are encouraged to go on their own or someday visit the original museums in Europe.
